themes.scientific_basis: Based on environmental psychology research and studies on territorial behavior in shared living spaces
themes.description: Evaluates how partners plan to balance personal and shared spaces, including expectations for privacy and territorial needs

themes.scientific_basis: Grounded in circadian psychology and research on couples' daily routine compatibility
themes.description: Assesses compatibility of partners' daily schedules, habits, and routines, including sleep patterns and energy levels

themes.scientific_basis: Based on equity theory and research on household labor distribution in relationships
themes.description: Measures how couples plan to divide household responsibilities and manage expectations for domestic tasks

themes.scientific_basis: Derived from financial psychology research and studies on money management in cohabiting relationships
themes.description: Examines how partners plan to handle shared expenses, savings, and financial decision-making when living together

themes.scientific_basis: Based on psychological boundary theory and research on maintaining individuality in cohabiting relationships
themes.description: Evaluates how couples establish and maintain healthy boundaries while sharing living space, including social boundaries

themes.scientific_basis: Grounded in conflict management research specific to cohabiting couples
themes.description: Assesses partners' preparedness for handling conflicts that may arise from sharing living space and resources

themes.scientific_basis: Based on social network theory and research on managing relationships with friends and family while cohabiting
themes.description: Measures how couples plan to balance social relationships and hosting responsibilities in their shared space

themes.scientific_basis: Derived from research on lifestyle congruence and its impact on relationship satisfaction
themes.description: Evaluates compatibility in living habits, cleanliness standards, and lifestyle preferences that affect daily cohabitation

themes.scientific_basis: Based on crisis management research and studies on couples' resilience during challenging times
themes.description: Assesses how couples plan to handle unexpected situations, emergencies, and major decisions in their shared living arrangement

themes.scientific_basis: Grounded in personal development research and studies on maintaining individual growth while cohabiting
themes.description: Examines how partners plan to support each other's personal growth and independence while sharing a living space
